phrases: Since I am not going to school, my body's been too idle.
So this is like a substitute for club activities.
We were not siblings, after all...
We were not siblings, after all...
Well then, let us keep working...
Hiromi-san, you must be tired, right?
No, I was just spacing out a bit.
Hey! was Here, that could work too
You are quite popular with the girls, huh?
TL Note: Ka-chan translates to mom, but he is referring to his wife.
These problems will show up in the test, so remember them well!
Alright, now copy down this problem.
There is nothing wrong with just taking notes, is there?
You have got it so good...
What is that supposed to mean?
Well then, maybe I should go see Ai-chan's cute face again.
It is being buried more and more... more... more...
The love message Shinichirou gave me...
Why do not you curse me too?
Curse me so that I will never come to like anyone.
I did something horrible to Miyokichi... something really horrible.
Is not a guy considered cool if his heart is not affected by anyone?
I want to become a guy exactly like that.
I will never agree to that.
I thought we needed to talk about this thoroughly again.
Noe cursed me so that I will never come to love anyone.
All I want now is to see Aiko smile.
Because Aiko has the prettiest smile.
I heard that it is going to be on the test.
I asked Tomoyo for the notes.
I think that will not happen.
Kurobe-san was sleeping like a sealed demon!
Then, I will talk to Tomoyo about your help.
She was sleeping so deeply that not even the teacher was able to wake her.
Even if that is what Raigoumaru was thinking,
This is not the place where you take flight.
Um... I would like to talk to you.
There is been a lot going on...
I am sorry for the trouble my wife has caused.
She went straight to the conclusion, thinking that with your mother, I...
Anyway, I understood what you wanted to say.
I will arrange it as soon as possible.
But, please do not forget this,
Hiromi, you are part of the family.
You did not pick up my calls.
Are not you still suspended, though?
I do not want to hear that from someone who is suspended and still needs to work.
Why do not we end it?
It is not that I hate you.
But a lot has happened, and I have done a lot of thinking.
I think I want to break free from all this at once, and sort out my feelings.
Oh, I will use my work money and pay your bike...
Breaking up would be troublesome for me!
Because you would break the contract?
I got an older bike from my boss.
I just need to exchange some parts and repair it, and it will run.
For preventing injuries, running is the best!
That is not something for you to be sad about!
Noe is a pretty nice girl.
It is the first time I have heard about that!
Did you feed it those red seeds?
Well, a lot of things happened.
Why are you coming to me?
We have dance practice later, you want to come?
Can you dance for me today?
This will be the last time I do it.
Eat as much as you would like!
There are lots of these left, so go ahead!
I will fetch you some tea.
Oh, this is my childhood friend Nobus...
This is my childhood friend Ai-chan.
It is about time to start.
Maybe I should say thank you.
Thanks to that curse you gave Miyokichi, I was saved.
Things like curses do not exist.
I did not tell my brother about this, so...
You two broke up, did not you?
So you heard about it from Miyokichi.
You are thinking that this is your fault, right?
But in truth, that is exactly it.
I will not accept Shinichirou's help anymore.
I am starting to outgrow you.
There is something I would like to talk about.
I have decided to leave this house.
He told me when I first came here,
If I do not feel comfortable living here, I could stay at his acquaintance's apartment.
But, I wanted to come to this house.
Then there is no need for you to leave now.
It is a lot of trouble living alone.
Oh, you were drawing something like this?
The you inside me has always been crying...
I want to wipe off your tears.
So you can draw this well, Shinichirou-kun.
I do not think it is a good idea for you to live alone.
Even while living in the same house,
I never got to know Shinichirou very well, it seems.
Even if that is what Raigoumaru was thinking,
So in the end, he decided to call it a day off.
Tomorrow, after filling his stomach, he will try to fly to the sky again.
In the end, I could not do anything.
I even pulled everyone close to me into this,
and all it did was hurt them.
I never got to know how your soft cheeks would feel after the tears are wiped off.
Is there anything else to carry?
I remembered what happened when I first moved here.
It was this empty in here that time, too.
It is not that happy of a memory, is it?
No, sometimes nice things happened as well.
We went to the festival when we were small, right?
After seeing I would lost one of my sandals, Shinichirou-kun made do with only one sandal, too.
You told me the other day that you do not remember that.
and we walked together with one shoe.
That is why I came to this house.
Even if I lost my parents and was alone...
But if I came here, I was sure Shinichirou-kun would help me find a way.
A way back from all that sadness.
But now, that is not something I can wish for anymore.
Thank you for taking care of me all this time.
Do not act like a stranger, we are still just a stonethrow away.
Feel free to stop by and eat with us.
If you want to come back, just tell me any time.
It is fine, we will see each other at school.
The you inside me has always been crying...
I want to wipe off your tears...
I want to wipe off your tears!
I could have wiped Hiromi's tears!
And still, why was I hesitating!?
I will properly wipe away your tears...
Properly wipe all of it away...
In the end, I could not understand your feelings.
Would not you like to meet?
The one you love is not me.
